website_summaries.verdict: Premium Alpine stereo featuring Bluetooth connectivity as well as easy to use controls.
pros: Powerful output of 50 watts by 4 channels
Bluetooth connectivity to manage music and calls from a smartphone
cons: HD radio reception depends on strength of station

customer_reviews.title: Take a look at these photos! This is how it was sent.
customer_reviews.text: Unit looked used, and the head unit screen was scratched. Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Single-DIN Alpine HU out there, period
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for a better HU. Bluetooth syncs up great, audio controls out the wazzoo, sounds great with my Alphine 5-ch amp, Pandora is great too. Now if the local radio stations would put out more info for the HD channels, that would be great - but that's not Alpine's fault. I have had Alpine HU's in the past, but this is the best one yet (if you remain at the single din size HU). Great choice here - you won't be disappointed. The picture here doesn't do the HU justice - it definitely looks better where the lit-up square areas are. It's very clear and not as bright as the picture conveys.
customer_reviews.author: Bamadog

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like Alpine...
customer_reviews.text: It was either this headunit or the Pioneer. For the money, this was the clear choice. Both have about the same features but I have always had good luck with Alpine products compared to other brands (Kenwood, Pioneer, JVC, Sony, etc.). Only wished the "white" color was a true white, not some light bluish color. Other than that, it's a great product for those who are limited to spacing of a single DIN headunits but want Bluetooth capability.
customer_reviews.author: Eric X.

customer_reviews.title: Serial # was scratched out. Perfect transaction otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Serial # was scratched out. Love the product. All you could ever want in a head unit. Alpine is the very best. The transaction was fast. BUT I could not register this product with Alpine company.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Deck!
customer_reviews.text: Love this deck. Great functions. Bluetooth works great for calls and music or Load up a USB stick and have at it. Also plays burned CDs with .mp3s. The only negative is the screen is too bright at night. Have not found a way to dim it yet.
customer_reviews.author: TAO

customer_reviews.title: Expected more from a $300+ Alpine car stereo
customer_reviews.text: It is a car stereo receiver that works and does everything it is supposed to. I just expected better quality in an Alpine product. The interface isn't great. It just looks and feels cheap. For a $350 stereo, I expected a lot more. I feel like I've purchased much cheaper Pioneer and Kenwood car stereos in the past and the control, concept, interface was so much better. Also, it is a pain to figure out how to scroll through radio stations one by one. By default, it wants to skip through like 10 at a time. Sound quality seems good overall. This is not the Alpine car stereo that Fresh Price referred to in his "Summertime" song.
customer_reviews.author: Rich B.

customer_reviews.title: Alpine's Flagship Design!
customer_reviews.text: As the pickiest stereo connoisseur you will likely ever meet, I give this stereo 5 stars. If you are a fan of easy-to-find features and commands not buried in multiple menus (think: Kenwood and Pioneer) then this stereo is for you. Its iron-clad, very stably built head unit. Alpine has for decades built high quality units, and this is by far their flagship design!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this receiver in my '99 Porsche 911, and it is a welcome upgrade! I had an Alpine receiver prior to this one, so I was fortunate enough to already have all the wiring in place. I connected this right up, slid it back in and was done. The Bluetooth setup is simple, and having it paired with my iPhone all my calls now display on my receiver and audio is run through my car sound system. The USB connection is probably my favorite option, allowing me to just connect a flash drive and have access to countless songs. If you're looking for a great receiver and are considering the CDE-HD149BT, I highly recommend going through with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carbon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deck!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this thing looks, sounds, and how easy it is to navigate. The Bluetooth works great and auto connects every time I get in the car. The buttons change colors and the red matches my Audi A3 interior perfect! Very high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Installed this radio in my vehicle and Bluetooth doesn't work ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed this radio in my vehicle and Bluetooth doesn't work, aux input doesn't work. The only thing that does work is Am/ FM. Pissed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alpine car deck
customer_reviews.text: Got the Alpine and installed. It is working great love the sound lots of options with setting the equalizer cut off frequency for the sub and separates. This is the second Alpine that I have owned and I am very happy with the sound. Was hoping to reconnect an Alpine CD Changer by plugging in the din from the changer, sadly it no longer exists. I am very happy with the set. Read some poor reviews and hope that it continues to work great.
customer_reviews.author: Charleine Lazzari

customer_reviews.title: good value/features
customer_reviews.text: For 99% of consumers, this has all the features you could possibly need and more than enough power to do hearing damage if you really push the internal amp. I really don't understand comments stating the need for an external amplifier for the purposes of volume. If you need higher SQ, then this isn't the head unit to start with as it's SQ is just average. The buttons are a tad bit loose and cheap feeling and the HD radio gets an echo as it goes back and fourth between SD and HD. I live in a suburb of KC and don't get too many HD stations, it's a bit of a let down in that respect.
customer_reviews.author: cjw8585

customer_reviews.title: Alpine always delivers!
customer_reviews.text: No need for a full in depth review. If you're looking for a great inexpensive deck that delivers in every way shy of having touch screen, look no further. This deck is the one. From sound quality to functionality. The 149bt won't let you down. Buy one and find out for yourself;)
customer_reviews.author: Justin Paskel

customer_reviews.title: Typical alpine quality
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a since single din for my 98 Cherokee. This might be the nicest single din radio in the market. Easy to install and setup. Has great sound. Bluetooth connects pretty quickly on my iPhone. Nice radio. Worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Stinky Thumbs

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: FM signal works great, but once transitions to HD signal sound is lost. CD doesn't work Pandora doesn't work Bluetooth not working on 3+ devices I know it's a good radio, just not the head unit I received
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!!
customer_reviews.text: Did some research and its the first hd radio ive had, really great sound, lots of options. I would download the user manual on-line as the one provided is super basic. Also the phone apps for tuning the sound seem pretty cool to mess with. Great radio with the new stuff you want, without the double din and touchscreen. It fits better in my P80 Volvo.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love this stereo
customer_reviews.text: Love this stereo. Installs very easily with the wire harness. Lots of nice features on this version. I also have the 148BT and wish I would have purchased this one because of the font difference. This shows the folder/song and still has room for the clock. The 148BT doesn't have room for the clock when you have it on folder/song. Which sucks because the car I have that one in, doesn't have a clock. Of course the one I have the 149BT in does. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: By far the best single din I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I love the 9 band parametric settings it’s a little odd to get used to since it’s a single din but it makes a huge difference once you figure out how to use it. The Bluetooth is decent, mine skips a very small bit but I’m not complaining. You’ll love it definitely worth the money, Alpine never disappoints
customer_reviews.author: Haden

customer_reviews.title: By far the best receiver you can get on the market today
customer_reviews.text: By far the best receiver you can get on the market today. Has every possible input you can think of. The sound is great for a Alpine. By far the best bang for you buck if you want a good aftermarket receiver!! And you can't beat the price. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: DAVE1234

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied, the radio came a day early actually so bonus!
customer_reviews.text: you just cant go wrong with Alpine. this is my second Alpine CDE-HD149BT that i have bought. The first one i installed was in a Jeep Wrangler to go along with a sub. This one will go in a Freightliner semi. I cant say enough good things about this radio its easy to navigate the menus, not too bright at night easy to see and has great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The screen is nice and big so I can easily read who is ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always been an Alpine fan. I purchased this for a 2013 street glide to replace the factory radio. The screen is nice and big so I can easily read who is calling me when the phone rings or to read the radio station. I haven't used the HD radio much as I've hooked this up to an ipod but it appears to have a good strong signal when used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: High quality sound at a reasonable price point.
customer_reviews.text: Strange how all the kids in the super electronics stores knock Alpine. This system has a clean crisp crystal clear sound. Paired with JL Amp and speakers. Great system.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C

customer_reviews.title: Best upgrade and Easy operation
customer_reviews.text: The Alpine CDE-HD149BT radio I bought replaced and older Alpine head unit that was in my truck and was out dated. The blue tooth and HD Work great along with XM satellite radio. Also work’s even better with the remote I purchased separate. I recommend this radio and would purchase agin.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Texas

customer_reviews.title: It's all good
customer_reviews.text: I am more happy with the purchase of my new Alpine deck every day. There are more sound settings than I even know what to do with but if I get willing to experiment I know it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for 1 year, and sold out to someone with 50 percent price, for my experience, the music quality is good, compared with pioneer unit ,my last unit with 970, 970 is better, and another regret is can’t compatible with flac music
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: This head unit is great. However, be careful who you buy from. The blue tooth mic may not work. Beware of Royal Audio. They promised to send another mic for this unit. Never happened.... They have had enough time. (Over 4 months)
customer_reviews.author: R Tyler Venable

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: An amazing deck, an issue conecting bluetooth but could be on my end, i still would highly recommend this stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Alpine 149bt with pxa-h800
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good for today's head units. I also have a pxa-h800 with ruc controller hooked together. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: scott jermstad

customer_reviews.title: Harness wiring but good product
customer_reviews.text: Had some challenges with marrying up the two wiring harnesses. The unit does come with a harness. The Sirius XM ready was a big selling point for me. The add on costs about 30 dollars and no clutter on the dash anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great display.
customer_reviews.text: Love the display. Easy to navigate. The remote is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Ty P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Great bluetooth connectivity with my iPhone 5
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Great bluetooth connectivity with my iPhone 5, as well as excellent HD radio service. Many lighting options are available. My 1 small complaint is that the auxiliary port is in the back... so you need to wire something at the time of installation to take advantage of that feature.
customer_reviews.author: ATX

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The clarity is so much better than the Kenwood I had
customer_reviews.author: Blake Dize

customer_reviews.title: Solid Alpine
customer_reviews.text: Excellent head unit in a single din format. Runs the system well. Front, rear, and sub line level outputs. Solid Alpine quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite stereo! I like the parametric eq and the crossover points. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: ... one of the units not too long ago and loved it so much I purchased another one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of the units not too long ago and loved it so much I purchased another one for my other vehicle. Great unit, price and easy to install. Fantastic set of features, Bluetooth works great, I would highly recommend this unit to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: A. Judis

customer_reviews.title: No to turn and get labor warranty
customer_reviews.text: Need to return, this deck keeps going blank when you change the song and now it is completely shutting off for no reason. Went to my installer and there is no issue with wiring.
customer_reviews.author: matthew pachter

customer_reviews.title: Hi The head unit sound great but it cannot be used in Singapore because the ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi The head unit sound great but it cannot be used in Singapore because the radio frequency only tune to odd digit. Example you cannot tune to 95.8, it only allow 95.7 or 95.9. How I wish it can accept even digit
customer_reviews.author: Eric tham

customer_reviews.title: All the adjustments needed
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for same Other one had 2000000 Miles and Bluetooth stopped working consistently
customer_reviews.author: Buck Charles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like them so much i got 2 one for my boat and truck
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Best Alpine stereo I've owned so far
customer_reviews.text: Best Alpine stereo I've owned so far. The Bluetooth is seamless and works like radios that are factory in newer cars. Plus the hands free calls is great. I don't have to go fishing for my phone. All I have to do is look at the display to know who is calling.
customer_reviews.author: Elton McGee

customer_reviews.title: Great features and excellent sound!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Took very long to ship though. Combined with a 4 channel Alpine amplifier and 2 pairs of Alpine 6.5 speakers, it sounds amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mychal Defreitas-Pollonais

customer_reviews.title: Time correction feature is great
customer_reviews.text: Best sounding stereo I have ever owned the time correction feature is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great in my Jeep Wrangler!!!
customer_reviews.text: Geez Louise, this radio is awesome! Very good sound quality, tons of inputs, and a compact chassis.... Perfect for my jeep!
customer_reviews.author: Syber_Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality,this is the worse alpine that i ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This radio SUCKS....i can turn up the radio volume at 30 and it fades out like a regular stock unit,I'm goin to get me a baseball bat and destroy this P.O.S.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth sounds good on both ends
customer_reviews.text: Tuning is on par with Alpine quality. Bluetooth sounds good on both ends. Solid choice if you plan to install all of your own speakers. Very clean sound!
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: Great headunit
customer_reviews.text: it was fairly easy to install tech support is very reliable, and knowledgable. Unit works great make the sound a lot louder and clearer at the same time. When I tested my stock headunit with the speakers they sounded good and clear but with the new unit its twice if not triple as loud and a lot clearer. Looks great it's well worth what I paid for and bluetooth works great
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V.

customer_reviews.title: Bad item tonbuy
customer_reviews.text: Not a good item to buy. Have never connected to my phone for hands free use No stars given.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Lee Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bang for your buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've always bought Kenwood stereos but this unit is far superior to anything Kenwood has anymore very happy happy happy
customer_reviews.author: S. Scott Horton

customer_reviews.title: best sounding head unit packed with features
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this head unit to replace my old Alpine.It has lots of features and the sound quality is amazing. If you don't have alpine then you don't have a quality sound.Alpine is the way to go for head units hands down
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Valdovinos

customer_reviews.title: Good unit so far
customer_reviews.text: It has worked exceptionally well for me besides one small complaint.. actually two. First I was unable to get the phone app to connect with the stereo to adjust settings. Second, its easy to accidentally push the knob button when trying to just turn the volume up or down resulting you to go into search mode and have to back track to get to volume control. Minor annoyance, but other than that solid unit, and sounds great with an alpine v9 5 chan. amp, Alpine Type R component speakers and a kicker 8" sub in a qlogic enclosure. .
customer_reviews.author: T. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I really like it.
customer_reviews.text: I really wish it supported my 32GB video "classic" ipod(the one with Bono/Gorillaz on the package). Other than that I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: John Montelongo Jr

customer_reviews.title: Alpine Does it Again
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Alpine in the past 20 years. The sound quality is excellent and it has more features than you can shake a stick at. The only gripe I have is that it doesn’t interface with the phone book as well as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: peter f pozzo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm a alpine guy i'll take a alpine over a jvc or sony or kenwood anyday. the bluetooth is easy and works well. the mic is pretty good on this one. love the HD radio built in and the 2 line screen really sets it apart from the other models. like this a lot however i bout this one for my dad and then decided i wanted the same one.....1 week later and the price was 50.00 bucks more. no bueno.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth streaming quit working after only 2 Months.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly disappointed. The Bluetooth streaming quit working only 2 months after I purchased it. That was a huge reason I bought this unit in the first place. The Alpine tech told me that it was something that they have had many problems with and if I sent it in they could have it back to me in 60 to 90 days. Seriously?? Horrible customer service. This is the last Alpine product that I will ever purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sjacob

customer_reviews.title: awesome head unit
customer_reviews.text: I love my Alpine. It does pretty much anythjng you want. You can connect nearly any media device ti this head unit. The amp you can buy extra is also a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Coffitt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Radio
customer_reviews.text: Great sound this is my second Alpine -- Would buy again -- Bought because it had the sealed face with the CD slot behind.
customer_reviews.author: Otto’s Detail

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for a single din head unit
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well. Highly recommend for a single din head unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great reciever
customer_reviews.text: Great receiver. The sound is awesome but the equalizer is complicated to set up without a degree in music. There is nothing this receiver doesn't have or do.
customer_reviews.author: russ skaggs jr.

customer_reviews.title: love it..!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: amaizing stereo very good sound cuality best head unit i ever had !
customer_reviews.author: moises

customer_reviews.title: Works with Iphone 7 lightning connector.
customer_reviews.text: Radio works great. I didn't know what to expect from the seller but no problems at all. Never can go wrong with Alpine. I connect my lighting connector to the USB and it sees my iPhone 7 and plays my songs or music apps. It also charges the phone.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE MAC

customer_reviews.title: Go Alpine!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal head unit for my 1992 F-150. I have probably the only truck from the early nineties that has hands free!
customer_reviews.author: lifelikedylan

customer_reviews.title: Wiring Harness changed so I had to solder a bunch of wires
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, installed fairly easy. but Alpine changed their harness a little bit so I had to use the supplied harness instead of the alpine harness from my last stereo. that little dig costs a star
customer_reviews.author: Chris Grazioli

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when ordering this product
customer_reviews.text: It has major issues with Bluetooth connectivity and the microphone doesn't work most of the times
customer_reviews.author: Charanpal Lochab

customer_reviews.title: 12 year upgrade made easy!
customer_reviews.text: Had a previous Alpine unit from 2004 and replaced that one with this. Plug and play was the best part. Otherwise all the features are easy to use and it sounds good in HD mode.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor W.

customer_reviews.title: Has some issues but great unit
customer_reviews.text: Great headunit. Yes there is issues with the Bluetooth. To fix just shut the unit off or unpair and pair the unit again and it should work.
customer_reviews.author: Cain W. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stereo at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit from Alpine would highly recommend easy to use love it
customer_reviews.author: THE MILLERS

customer_reviews.title: Really good head unit
customer_reviews.text: Really good head unit. Sounds awesome and gives out plenty of power for my 7 speaker audio system in my car. Only problem I can think of is the option to save names of songs you hear on the radio is only for iPhone users and also I can't get my unit to dis play the name for radio at all via an analog connection.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this pine and 2 Rockford Fosgate amps. Two 10 inch Infinity subs and two Infinity 6•9s and front spreakers. I'll let you know how it all works out.
customer_reviews.author: TERRY L.BUTLER

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding radio
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding radio. Takes a little time to get it adjusted correctly. Of course it might have been easier for a professional. Really pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New stereo
customer_reviews.text: Works great and fit nicely with all the modern features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alpine CDE-149BT.  GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Awesome !!!!!! Good car stereo Alpine CDE-149BT. Thanks to amazon for prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amanullah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this head unit but the microphone was DOA!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Clark

customer_reviews.title: JIMM
customer_reviews.text: The Alpine CDE-HD149BT receiver is great. The music & the bluetooth sound quality is very nice!!! It also has a really bright detachable face.
customer_reviews.author: Jymnastiq

customer_reviews.title: GLITCHES AND MORE GLITCHES
customer_reviews.text: Came four days late then Bluetooth, Pandora, aux and CD DOESN'T work just has error messages! The Tuneit app doesn't work either so you can not fully adjust your EQ without it! What a huge disappointment! I will say that my radio never sounded so clean with HD .
customer_reviews.author: Cooper C.

customer_reviews.title: Alpine CDE-HD149BT
customer_reviews.text: I purchase another Alpine unit head for another vehicle last year and enjoy the sound quality. This is the latest version that Alpine make and wanted to upgrade from a Kenwood unit head which was not easy to adjust the sound. I would recommend this unit head if your are in the market for a quality unit.
customer_reviews.author: James L Vicain

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Easy to read, phone call quality is great, and sound customization is superb. Only hang up was that my iphone 5 had to be connected by lightning connector for Pandora to work - it would not work by Bluetooth. Everything was flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Estep

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome !Awesome !Awesome ! Alpine is the best of the best.....
customer_reviews.author: Danvanstang

customer_reviews.title: just what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pair. Great call quality. Pandora control with Bluetooth is great. Recommend to anyone looking for a wireless setup with multiple sources.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Glessner

customer_reviews.title: This radio was just what the Dr ordered it arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: This radio was just what the Dr ordered it arrived on time and we definitely got our monies worth. We definetly will be pur ch a sing future products from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal jackson

customer_reviews.title: Installation Fees X Two
customer_reviews.text: I can honesty say that I was shocked with the fact the unit malfunctioned . I've been a Alpine fan for years and never had a issue with their equipment. This head unit Would not eject the CD , and cost me double installation fee's .
customer_reviews.author: Paul Reagor

customer_reviews.title: Alpine should decrease the number of controls you only need so much too much is not better only more that is not used
customer_reviews.text: Too many inputs. clear sound . Clock very very very small .Alpine should decrease the number of controls you only need so much too much is not better only more that is not used.
customer_reviews.author: Ragheb El Itriby

customer_reviews.title: Seems good!
customer_reviews.text: I have not taken the receiver out of the box yet, as the vehicle isn't far enough along in the process to install it. The receiver was shipped quickly and did not appear to have any damage. I'm very happy with the transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Divish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Head Unit!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this head unit with a Polk PA D5005.5 amp to replace the Bose MOST system that failed in my Porsche. The sound is exceptional. I also have an iPad mini installed in my dash that use for my media and navigation. I have found that this unit will not charge the iPad mini (1). The Bluetooth will only allow one device to be connected at a time. I wish it would allow multiple. The Bluetooth calling sounds clear on my end but I have been told that I'm some what difficult to hear when the car is moving.
customer_reviews.author: Slopeslider

customer_reviews.title: New to HD radio
customer_reviews.text: I got this highly-rated HD radio unit because my favorite public radio station started multicasting in HD. Unfortunately, what I get is nearly constant time-shifting, volume changing, and echo. I presume that this is due to constant switching between digital and analog. I'm not sure if this lack of synchronization is a flaw in the HD radio unit, or a flaw in the radio station's multicast equipment. Any thoughts?
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing radio from Alpine
customer_reviews.text: This was disappointing because I've always used Alpine radios in the past. The major issues with this radio are that bluetooth is very unreliable and speaker for calls is horrible. . You will need to buy another speaker (other than alpine) to make calls because the one that comes with this radio is pure garbage. I had a cheap standalone speaker for calls before and it was far and away better than this one (wish I didn't get rid of it). Also there are times the radio doesn't respond because the pins behind the faceplate are dusty. When it works correctly it's not a bad radio but there are way too many issues to give this a good review.
customer_reviews.author: biggie

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth problems
customer_reviews.text: I would go get this 5 stars but I have constant Bluetooth connectivity problems. It connects to my Android and can make phone calls (which I don't use because the mic is garbage) but it won't play music 65% of the time. I have to change source and or turn on and off Bluetooth constantly. Wtf Alpine!??? Maybe there's a newer firmware update? No clue. If you want this for Bluetooth..... I would think twice. Pioneer has much better Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: This is a great receiver with almost every feature you could possibly want ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great receiver with almost every feature you could possibly want in a single DIN form factor. Bluetooth works perfectly for Android Marshmallow and Oreo. USB doesn't work with my phone but that's not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sokhom Chhim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it more every time I use it, great screen and settings and search function. Display can match most any dash lights, sounds great, layout much better than previous model. Thrilled with this headunit.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Mama

customer_reviews.title: Alpine knocked it out of the park!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deck. Sounds great thru bluetooth phone, and music off my cellphone. My ipod classic works well with the deck. Comes with a fairly long usb cord that you hook your ipod cord up to. I have it hooked up to a 5 channel smaller alpine amp. They integrate nicely. Took me a long time to figure out what deck to buy, and Im glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: fixitforgood

customer_reviews.title: Great head unit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent head unit. I had an old Alpine head unit that I thought would be difficult to beat in terns of sound quality but this new Alpine blows it out of the water. It just sounds so much better. It's got ton of features and adjustments. Still playing around with the sound but out of the box it sounds wonderful. The Bluetooth works fine but sometimes It doesn't recognize my iPhone 5. I then have to reconnect manually. The new alpines are now made in China opposed to them being made in Japan previously. So far the best Alpine head unit I've purchased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. The display is clear and attractive. My favorite thing is that as soon as I turn my Jeep on, it will automatically connect to my phone via Bluetooth and turn on the most recent player used (usually either google music, podcast addict or slacker). Google music and slacker will resume playing automatically and can be controlled through the head unit. The podcast player will show the current podcast but can't be controlled through the head unit. I haven't tried other podcasters but others may work. The display will also show artist/song/album which is a nice touch. I have been looking for the right head unit for almost 2 years and I am completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: WC

customer_reviews.title: A great upgrade for your Single DIN auto
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connectivity works for your iPhone flawlessly. Setup was straight forward and easy. Take a little time to get familiar with buttons and you are golden. Works great with jump drives,iPods,and iPhones!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit besides the bluetooth and Microphone
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this headunit except the bluetooth connection. The Microphone that came included did not work, had to buy a new microphone smh
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good radio. Menu is slow to save settings. Doesnt play music of my USB drive.
customer_reviews.text: Mine has some debris in the display. Doesn't have full EQ just Bass and Treble Other than that pretty nice radio.
customer_reviews.author: Sophano Van

customer_reviews.title: Good radio and recommend it
customer_reviews.text: There no touch screen lol but the radio works very well. Alpine is made in Japan and good radio and I use the xm satellite radio
customer_reviews.author: Richard Vo

customer_reviews.title: This is my upgrade replacement for an original Toyota unit.
customer_reviews.text: I put this in place of existing Toyota unit because I did not like the controls on the Toyota unit. It was easy to order an in-dash adapter mounting device. I have a similar Alpine unit in another car, so now they are both familiar to me and easy to learn how to operate them .
customer_reviews.author: MrLee211

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and fantastic sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This head unit is incredible. Easy to install and fantastic sound quality. It is a challenge to adjust all the sound settings to get them just right but, it's great to be able to have that much adjustment. The Tuneit app does help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Eggs

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, lots of options for stuff
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, lots of options for stuff, able to hook up amps for front, rear and sub, can throw my ipod in the glove box and control it via the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth worked just once,doesn’t want to connect to anything anymore,garbage!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arkadiusz Mazur

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a dying 9887 with this unit. A lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a dying 9887 with this unit. A lot more functions and tuning. Bluetooth syncs when phone is in the vehicle. Hands free mic is decently clear to the person on the other end. The individual tuning for each input was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Rholston

product_meta.title: Alpine CDE-HD149BT Single-Din Bluetooth Car Stereo with HD Radio, Premium LCD Display and SiriusXM Ready
product_meta.description: Alpine Single-Din Bluetooth Car Stereo with HD Radio, Premium LCD Display and SiriusXM Ready
feature_bullets: Receiver Size: Single DIN, Faceplate Security: Detachable, Remote Control Optional: Alpine RUE-4202 (Accessory required and sold separately), Peak Power Output 50 watts x 4 channels, RMS Power Output 18 watts x 4 channels, Preamp RCA Outputs: 3 Pairs (Front, Rear, and Subwoofer)

Dedicated Subwoofer Preamp RCA Output, Preamp Voltage: 4 volts, Built-In Equalizer: 9-band parametric equalizer, Display Type: LCD Text Display, Display Color: White, Button Color: 4 Selectable Colors, CD Signal-to-Noise: 105 dB, CEA-2006 Compliant, AM/FM Tuner, FM Presets: 12, AM Presets: 6
iPhone / iPod Features: iPhone 5 Compatible, Audio Playback, iPod Audio Integration (via iPod USB Cable or Accessory Cable Below), Scosche IPUSB2: Standard USB-to-iPod Cable
Radio Data System (RDS), CD-R/RW Playback, MP3 Playback, USB Input: Rear, Additional Audio/Video Inputs: Rear 3.5mm, Compatible Smartphones: iPhone (iOS), Android
Parts and labor warranty duration 1 year
